sourcesContent:
<script>
import Datepicker from '@vuepic/vue-datepicker';
import '@vuepic/vue-datepicker/dist/main.css';
import AppInput from "@/core/AppInput.vue";
import useComplexForm from "@/compositions/useComplexForm";
import {h, ref} from 'vue';

export default {
  setup(props) {
    const dates = ref([new Date(), new Date()]);

    const format = (dates) => {
      if (dates.length === 0) {
        return "";
      }

      const formattedDates = dates.map((date) => {
        const day = date.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0');
        const month = (date.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0');
        const year = date.getFullYear();
        return `${day}.${month}.${year}`;
      });

      return formattedDates.join(" – ");
    };

    const textInputOptions = {
      format: ['dd.MM.yyyy', 'dd.MM.yyyy'],
    };

    const { handleDateInterval } = useComplexForm();

    const handleDate = (val) => {
      handleDateInterval(props.name, format(val))
    };

    return {
      dates,
      textInputOptions,
      handleDate,
    };
  },

  render() {
    return h('div', { class: 'sm:tw-col-span-3' }, [
      h(Datepicker, {
        vModel: this.dates,
        range: true,
        partialRange: false,
        textInput: this.textInputOptions,
        name: 'datepicker',
        enableTimePicker: false,
        monthNameFormat: 'long',
        format: this.format,
        locale: 'ru',
        selectText: 'Выбрать',
        cancelText: 'Отмена',
        position: 'left',
        vertical: true,
        clearable: false,
        onUpdateModelValue: this.handleDate,
        autoApply: true,
      }, [
        h('template', { slot: 'dp-input' }, [
          h(AppInput, {
            type: 'text',
            name: this.props.name,
            rules: this.props.rules,
            label: this.props.label,
            'v-maska': '##.##.#### – ##.##.####',
          })
        ])
      ]),
      h(AppInput, {
        type: 'text',
        name: 'my_orgname',
        rules: 'required',
        label: 'Наименование организации поверителя',
        'v-maska': '##.##.#### – ##.##.####',
      })
    ]);
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.dp__main {
  font-family: UbuntuLight, sans-serif;
}
</style>
